name: INSearchForAccountsIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for searching for account information.

items.name: func resolveAccountNickname(for: INSearchForAccountsIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the account nickname to use during a search.

items.name: func resolveAccountType(for: INSearchForAccountsIntent, with: (INAccountTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the account type to look for in a search.

items.name: func resolveOrganizationName(for: INSearchForAccountsIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the organization name to use during a search.

items.name: func resolveRequestedBalanceType(for: INSearchForAccountsIntent, with: (INBalanceTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the balance type to look for in a search.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSearchForAccountsIntent, completion: (INSearchForAccountsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can perform the search.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSearchForAccountsIntent, completion: (INSearchForAccountsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles searching for the account information.
